CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 6 The V oc of PQCDTB was greater than the widely known poly(3-hexylthiophene) , P3HT ( V oc = 0.5 - 0.6 V ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Voc of PQCDTB |
| Poly(3-hexylthiophene) |
| P3HT |
| Voc (Volume potential) of PQCDTB |
| Voc (Volume potential) of P3HT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| Poly(3-hexylthiophene) |
| P3HT |

Explanation:

The original paragraph mentions "Voc of PQCDTB" and "Voc of P3HT". "Voc" stands for "Volume potential", which is a property of a material. Therefore, "PQCDTB" and "P3HT" are the materials being referred to in the paragraph.

| Property Name |
| Voc (Volume Potential) |
| of |

Note: In this case, "was greater than" was changed to "is greater than" to maintain consistency with the present tense used for the first property. Also, "widely known" was removed as it does not directly refer to a material property.
